nodes.text: A battle droid was stationed in the hangar of a Separatist supply ship stationed over the planet of Umbara during the Battle of Umbara.

When the Separatist supply ship was infiltrated by three Galactic Republic clone troopers flying captured Umbaran starfighters, the B1-Series battle droid was speaking to two other droids, telling them that the break was over and to start working again. After the droid finished his sentence and walked away, he was hit by the wing of one of the commandeered starfighters and was destroyed.
The B1 battle droid, like every battle droid in The Clone Wars movie and The Clone Wars TV series, was voiced by Matthew Wood. His name was never given.
